Trade/Device Name(s): CONFIRM anti-Progesterone Receptor (1E2) Rabbit Monoclonal Primary Antibody
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CONFIRM anti-Progesterone Receptor (1E2) Rabbit Monoclonal Primary Antibody for qualitative detection of PR in breast cancer tissue sections using immunohistochemistry.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative detection of progesterone receptor antigen in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections to aid in management, prognosis, and prediction of hormone therapy for breast carcinoma, using VENTANA automated slide stainers and detection kits.
